name: Resident evil 7 Banned Footage Vol.1
description:
This newly unearthed footage exposes further secrets from the dark past of the Baker family.<br/>
<br/>
- Nightmare: Trapped in a basement full of unknown horrors, you must fight for your life.<br/>
- Bedroom: Tied to a bed, you must try to escape while avoiding Mother's watchful gaze. Includes the highly difficult extra bonus content Ethan Must Die.
